fact_check_explanation_title: Can I move to a different home during lockdown?
fact_check_explanation_summary: There is different guidance on this depending on the circumstances.

fact_check_explanation_title: Government guidance did say it was ‘very unlikely’ people in care homes would be infected with Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: Boris Johnson was incorrect to say government guidance had not said it was ‘very unlikely’ that people in care homes would get the new coronavirus

fact_check_explanation_title: Why were there mixed messages over returning to work in lockdown?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Initial reports suggested some people would be expected to return to work on Monday rather than Wednesday.

fact_check_explanation_title: It’s true that recent changes to lockdown rules are slightly different throughout the UK
fact_check_explanation_summary: The UK government can only change lockdown rules for England.

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson mistakenly said that Covid-19 could be monitored through the water supply
fact_check_explanation_summary: When talking about monitoring Covid-19, Boris Johnson referred to detecting it in the water supply when he meant to say wastewater.

fact_check_explanation_title: This little girl called Alice is not missing from your area
fact_check_explanation_summary: This is an ongoing scam. Do not click the link.

fact_check_explanation_title: Viral Facebook post is wrong on deaths in first three months of 2020
fact_check_explanation_summary: The statistics in this Facebook post are wrong. Many people are dying of Covid-19 in the UK.

fact_check_explanation_title: New lockdown guidance doesn’t mean you can see both parents at once
fact_check_explanation_summary: Dominic Raab was wrong to say that people can see both their parents at once as long as they all social distance.

fact_check_explanation_title: Two police forces did not use the same photo to illustrate two different lockdown crimes
fact_check_explanation_summary: Cumbria Road Police said that the picture is from an incident they dealt with.

fact_check_explanation_title: This post about Covid-19 and blood clotting conditions contains inaccuracies
fact_check_explanation_summary: Some people with severe Covid-19 develop blood clotting problems, but this doesn’t mean that pneumonia is a misdiagnosis.

fact_check_explanation_title: A scientific review did not conclude that there are no cases of children transmitting the new coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Newspapers have incorrectly reported the results of a review of evidence relating to Covid-19 in children.

fact_check_explanation_title: Health Secretary uses Facebook poll to estimate coronavirus tracing app take-up
fact_check_explanation_summary: Facebook polls cannot be said to represent the wider population.
